Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1991...
Injured on 6/13/1991 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/13/1991 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/31/1992 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: LF M. Lawton, P J. Valera. Going to PHI: P B. Wilkinson)...
Injured on 6/18/1994 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1995 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1996, off Pedro J. Martinez (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1996, off Charles Nagy (NYM)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1996, hitting .519 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1996, hitting .385 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1996, hitting .293 with 18 HR, 60 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1996...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1997, hitting .519 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
